name: SALTR Birdie
description:
SALTR Birdie is a 2D side-scrolling game for SALTR apps & games personalization platform.

In SALTR Birdie you can:
- Design and test levels with SALTR's Level Editor;
- Create and use different variants of levels;
- Adjust feature values like Birdie's flying speed etc.;
- Reorder the levels;
- See your changes instantly in the game without updates;
- And much more!
